entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullable field warnings are missing when using struct primary constructors #74726
  • Update Roslyn's transitive dependency on System.Formats.Asn1 #74725
  • "Find All References" does not find all the associated references of namespaces #74718
  • Created Template Item not duplicated exactly when added #74717
  • VisualStudio FileChangeWatcher doesn't correctly report changes for multiple projects #74716
  • No nullable warning emmited for non-nullable properties on structs. #74715

Closed

  • Lightbulb Preview: InvalidOperationException: Unsupported extension '.tmp' and LSP language id 'CSharp' #74723
  • error RZ3600: Invalid value ''' for RazorLangVersion. Valid values include 'Latest' or a valid version in range 1 .0 to 8.0 #74410

PullRequests

Created

  • Send a TextDocumentidentifier for razor dynamic file requests/responses #74727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Preserve document extension for the preview content we create #74724
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused parameter in analyzer loading code #74720
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reenable workspace pull diagnostics #74722
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make analyzer mvid part of our checksum #74721
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revise usage of `<code>` tag in `IOperation` docs #74719
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Modify ISyntaxTreeFactoryService.CreateSyntaxTree to take in an optional SourceText. #74707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • [WIP] Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle partial properties in struct field ordering warning #74706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Modify MergedNamespaceDeclaration.MakeChildren to to allocate less #74698
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add span type inference #74646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Fix some small things with readme #74709
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
